text:
If you run an Ant script on an OS that supports symlinks and you untar an
archive that contains symlinks you would expect those links to be created
properly. Currently empty files will be created instead.

This is somewhat related to bug 40059.
creator: marius.scurtescu@gmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 19252 ***
